page.title: 08HARMONIC MALE VOICE CHOIR
page.content: {Thurnscoe Harmonic Male Voice Choir has provided many hours of enter- tainment for villagers in Thurnscoe for{60 years.}They practice on Sundays and Wednesdays and go to many festivals. The don't just go to festivals in England but also they sometimes go abroad and show their talents to other people. Altogether there are about{60 men}in the choir and they are from different walks of life. In 1926 when the National Coal Strike was on, the Choir had festivals and all the money that was made was given both locally and nationally to people who were in need. After this they disbanded during the Second World War and reformed in 1948. The pianist is called Mrs Hill and her father Mr Clennel is the President .
